data.eml:eml: Eidinemacheilus, a new generic name for Noemacheilus smithi Greenwood (Teleostei, Nemacheilidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Segherloo, Iraj Hashemzadeh, Ghaedrahmati, Nabiallah, Freyhof, Jörg (2016): Eidinemacheilus, a new generic name for Noemacheilus smithi Greenwood (Teleostei, Nemacheilidae). Zootaxa 4147 (4): 466-476, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4147.4.7
